description:
WARNING!!! If you have already enrolled for our course "Be A Great Manager. Build Your Career. Earn More Money" Then you DO NOT need to enroll for this one as it is a part of our large 10 hour course.

This short 60 min. course will provide you with a set of instruments and solutions for effective time management developed inside SUN Microsystems corporation for internal use. Now you can use these instruments as well!

In 60 minutes of this course you will find out:

  • How human brain works
  • Why multitasking is not effective
  • How to "plow" tasks
  • Effective tasks structuring, delegation and control
  • Using mail clients for effective work organizing

The course consists of 1 section and 3 lectures.

The Video part you will cover in 50 minutes.

The Homework part may take you several weeks to complete.

______________________________________________________________________

Pricing: $9 is an introductory price.

It is about to change to $19 very soon and later even to $29.

So take your chance to enroll for this super attractive price before time runs out!
______________________________________________________________________
title: Do More By Actually Doing Less!   Effective Time Management.
